item.title: 工党大会将笼罩在债券市场的阴影之下
item.description: 下周，当执政党工党的政治家和党员们齐聚一堂参加年度会议时，还有一个重要的受众需要考虑：英国债券市场。【原文：When the ruling Labour Party’s politicians and members gather for their annual conference next week, there will be another crucial audience to think about: the UK bond market.】

item.title: 赞比亚因贷款纠纷面临非洲进出口银行仲裁
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，非洲进出口银行正就债务减免纠纷对赞比亚提起仲裁，此举可能为其他国家寻求重组无力偿还的贷款开创先例。【原文：African Export-Import Bank is pursuing arbitration against Zambia in a dispute over debt relief, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that may set a precedent for other nations seeking to restructure loans they can’t afford.】

item.title: 紫金矿业香港股价大涨，溢价率再创新高
item.description: 紫金矿业集团股份有限公司（Zijin Mining Group Co.【原文：Zijin Mining Group Co.’s Hong Kong-listed shares are trading near a record premium over those in the mainland, as foreign investors rush to buy the stock of a company enjoying a boom period for gold.】

item.title: 在美国交易中，TikTok 业务价值堪比无聊蓝筹股
item.description: 对 TikTok 美国业务提出的 140 亿美元的标价，更像是对一家老旧的能源或食品公司的估值，而不是对一家全球领先的社交媒体公司的估值。【原文：The $14 billion price tag proposed for TikTok’s US business values it more like a stuffy old energy or food company than a leading global social media company.】

item.title: 美联储降息前景不明，新兴市场资产受关税新政影响下滑
item.description: 由于美国新一轮关税（包括对品牌或专利药品征收 100%的关税）打击了市场情绪，新兴市场资产下跌，而强劲的美国数据给美联储降息的前景蒙上了阴影，帮助美元守住了涨幅。【原文：Emerging-market assets dropped as the fresh round of US tariffs including a 100% duty on branded or patented pharmaceuticals hurt sentiment while strong American data clouded the view on Fed rate cuts, helping the dollar hold onto gains.】

item.title: 印度节日黄金需求将因价格创新高而下降
item.description: 在即将到来的节日期间，印度的黄金珠宝销售额将下降，因为创纪录的金条价格促使全球最大市场之一的印度买家转向成本更低的替代品。【原文：Gold jewelry sales in India are set to drop during the upcoming festival season, as record bullion prices push buyers toward less costly alternatives in one of the world’s largest markets.】

item.title: 桑切斯致力于将西班牙的经济成就转化为选票
item.description: 佩德罗-桑切斯和他的团队坐在政府专机上等待起飞时，唐纳德-特朗普突然发飙了。【原文：Pedro Sanchez and his team were sat on their government jet waiting for take off when Donald Trump let rip.】

item.title: 商界领袖称合作关系避免了南非的失败
item.description: 南非一些最大公司的领导人表示，与南非政府的合作帮助经济避免了 "潜在的失败"。【原文：Leaders from some of South Africa’s biggest companies said a partnership with the country’s government has helped the economy avoid “potential failure.”】

item.title: 英国寻求制定人工智能规则以推动医疗改革并保护患者
item.description: 英国正在推进人工智能在医疗保健领域的应用，并成立了一个国家委员会，以帮助该国吸引医疗技术投资，充分利用人工智能革命。【原文：The UK is pushing ahead on regulations for artificial intelligence in health care, creating a national commission to help the country attract health-tech investment and make the most of the AI revolution.】

item.title: BMI 称印尼 GDP 增长将低于普拉博沃的 8%目标
item.description: 据研究公司BMI称，从美国关税、青年高失业率到总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）扩大军方权力的决定等因素，都将阻碍印尼的长期增长。【原文：Indonesia’s long-term growth will be stunted by factors ranging from US tariffs and high youth unemployment to President Prabowo Subianto’s decision to expand the powers of the military, according to research firm BMI.】

item.title: 新加坡电信和 Optus 首席执行官将就致命故障会见澳大利亚部长
item.description: 新加坡电信有限公司（Singapore Telecommunications Ltd.）及其 Optus 分部的负责人将于下周与澳大利亚通信部长阿尼卡-韦尔斯（Anika Wells）会面，因为该电话公司正在努力应对导致多人死亡的网络中断事件的后果。【原文：The heads of Singapore Telecommunications Ltd. and its Optus division will meet with Australian Communications Minister Anika Wells next week as the phone company struggles with the fallout of a network outage that resulted in multiple deaths.】

item.title: 小米承诺加大 YU7 电动汽车的生产力度
item.description: 小米公司的亿万富翁联合创始人誓言要加快 YU7 电动汽车的生产速度，因为三个月内的交付量已达到 40,000 辆，这是他实现长期抱负的一大障碍。【原文：Xiaomi Corp.’s billionaire co-founder vowed to speed production of the YU7 electric vehicle as deliveries touched 40,000 within three months, taking aim at a big obstacle to his longer-term ambitions.】

item.title: 斯坦查特风险投资公司（StanChart Venture Arm）与富士通合作开发量子计算技术
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）的风险投资部门与富士通公司（Fujitsu Ltd.）在量子计算领域展开合作，这是一系列金融公司为加快服务速度而投资更快技术的最新案例。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc’s venture building arm and Fujitsu Ltd. teamed up on quantum computing, the latest in a slew of financial firms investing in faster technology to speed up services.】

item.title: 花旗称泰国或将大幅降息以抑制泰铢走势
item.description: 据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Thailand’s central bank could deliver a larger interest-rate cut in October as officials are under pressure to take quick and strong measures to curb the strengthening baht, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 受 H-1B 问题影响，印度科技股将迎来四月以来最差一周
item.description: 由于 H-1B 签证费的大幅上涨恶化了印度软件出口商的盈利前景，他们的股价将创下近六个月来最差的一周。【原文：Indian software exporters’ shares are heading for their worst week in nearly six months as a steep hike in H-1B visa fee worsens their earnings outlook.】

item.title: 菲律宾因风暴 "布阿洛伊 "关闭办公室而停止货币交易
item.description: 菲律宾将从周五下午起暂停货币交易，大多数政府机构也将暂停运作，因为强烈热带风暴 "布瓦洛伊 "在穿越菲律宾群岛时加速了速度。【原文：The Philippines will suspend currency trading from Friday afternoon, with operations of most government agencies suspended as Severe Tropical Storm Bualoi accelerated as it crossed the archipelago.】

item.title: 供应中断导致铜价创四月以来最大单周涨幅
item.description: 在一系列减产导致全球供应紧张加剧之后，铜价创下五个月来最大单周涨幅。【原文：Copper headed for its biggest weekly gain in five months after a global supply crunch intensified due to a spate of production setbacks.】

item.title: H-1B 增添挑战，TCS 市值缩水逾 500 亿美元
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 千禧年与 Modular 结束 6 亿美元资产管理交易
item.description: 宏观对冲基金创始人吉米-林（Jimmy Lim）在为千禧年管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）管理资金超过八年后，将停止为该公司管理资金。【原文：Macro hedge fund founder Jimmy Lim is set to stop managing money for Millennium Management LLC after more than eight years, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 供应下降缓解紧张情绪，长债突然重新流行起来
item.description: 随着投资者关注供应变化，并在大跌后寻找便宜货，全球长期债券的压力正在减轻。【原文：Pressure on long-dated bonds is easing around the world as investors eye supply changes and hunt for bargains after a selloff.】

item.title: 印尼 "大胆 "干预，印尼盾走软创纪录
item.description: 印度尼西亚中央银行表示，在印尼盾跌至历史最低点之际，该行正在 "大胆 "干预金融市场，以稳定印尼盾。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank said it is intervening “boldly” in financial markets to stabilize the rupiah as the currency falls toward a record low.】

item.title: 黑客攻击活动已入侵美国政府的思科设备
item.description: 据一位高级联邦官员称，黑客入侵了美国联邦政府内部的防火墙设备。【原文：Hackers compromised firewall devices within the US federal government, according to a senior federal official.】

item.title: S.韩国总统李明博称朝鲜拥有足以维持生存的核武器
item.description: 韩国总统李在明（Lee Jae Myung）表示，朝鲜已经获得了足以保证政权生存的核武器，并且即将完成能够打到美国的洲际弹道导弹技术。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said North Korea has already secured sufficient nuclear weapons to guarantee regime survival, and is nearing completion of intercontinental ballistic missile technology capable of reaching the US.】

item.title: 受风险厌恶情绪和 ETF 资金流入影响，黄金有望实现第六周上涨
item.description: 受地缘政治紧张局势加剧、资金流入金银支持的交易所交易基金以及更广泛市场的风险厌恶情绪的支撑，黄金交易价格略低于创纪录水平，有望实现第六周上涨。【原文：Gold traded just below a record — on track for a sixth weekly gain — supported by elevated geopolitical tensions, inflows into bullion-backed exchange-traded funds, and a risk-off tone in broader markets.】

item.title: 印度打击期权交易，150 年历史的交易所意外获胜
item.description: 监管机构对印度期权市场的打击正在推动 BSE Ltd. 的市场份额增长，帮助它挑战一家规模更大的交易所竞争对手的主导地位。【原文：A regulatory crackdown on India’s options market is fueling market share gains for BSE Ltd., helping it to challenge the dominance of a larger exchange rival.】

item.title: 金田公司出售价值 11 亿澳元的 Northern Star 股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，金田有限公司以 11 亿澳元（约合 7.25 亿美元）的价格出售了同为矿业公司的北极星资源有限公司的股份。【原文：Gold Fields Ltd. sold a stake in fellow miner Northern Star Resources Ltd. for A$1.1 billion ($725 million), according to people familiar with the matter, asking not to be identified to discuss private information.】

item.title: YouTube 争取将康卡斯特的 Peacock 纳入付费电视捆绑计划
item.description: 如果两家公司不能在 9 月 30 日前达成新的分销协议，YouTube TV 用户可能会失去康卡斯特公司旗下 NBCUniversal 网络的节目，包括周日的 NFL 比赛。【原文：YouTube TV subscribers may lose programming from Comcast Corp.’s NBCUniversal networks, including Sunday NFL games, if the companies can’t reach a new distribution agreement by Sept. 30.】

item.title: 中国最大的金融科技公司用人工智能管理公司资金
item.description:
这家由马云支持的公司正利用其庞大的数据库和人工智能工程专长，大力进军被忽视但利润丰厚的全球现金管理领域。【原文：

The Jack Ma-backed company is using its vast data trove and AI engineering expertise to muscle into the overlooked yet lucrative world of global cash management.

】

item.title: 超级周期 "可能延长韩国芯片制造商的千亿美元涨势
item.description: 随着人工智能热潮向科技界不那么令人兴奋的角落蔓延，韩国两家最大的芯片制造商本月市值增长超过 1,000 亿美元的迅猛涨势有望继续。【原文：The blistering rally that has added more than $100 billion in market value to South Korea’s two largest chipmakers this month is seen continuing, as the artificial intelligence boom spreads to less exciting corners of the tech world.】

item.title: 分析师称，外汇波动缓和提升了新兴市场套利交易的吸引力
item.description: 瑞穗证券公司（Mizuho Securities Co.）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Easing currency volatility is giving fresh support to emerging-market carry trades by reducing risk, according to analysts at Mizuho Securities Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】
